alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Eastern Clay; Inland Nassau; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Clay; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 6:59PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Nassau, northwestern St. Johns, northern Clay, Duval and southeastern Camden Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 659 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Kings Bay Base to near Fort Caroline to near Middleburg. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, St. Marys, Kingsland, Fernandina Beach, Orange Park, Jacksonville International Arpt, Unf, Kings Bay Base, Mandarin and Fruit Cove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Eastern Clay; Inland Nassau; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Clay; Western Duval
